BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Maltese, S.6495, and Assembly Member Abbate, A.9463, “AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to provisional employees of certain public employers; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Provisional employees of certain public employers.

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Maltese, S.6495, and Assembly Member Abbate, A.9463, “AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to provisional employees of certain public employers; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof”.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this SLR be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Provisional employees of certain public employers.
